rows.label: qev055201_MSG0001
rows.name:
My men headed out for Noctilum by truck,
but I've lost contact with them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055201_MSG0002
rows.name:
They were part of a special team for this mission,
along with an Orphean. I left everything to him,
and now... Rrrgh! Dammit![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055201_JNK0010
rows.name: Query

rows.label: qev055201_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask about this special team.

rows.label: qev055201_JNK0020
rows.name: Mock

rows.label: qev055201_SEL0021
rows.name: Tell Robert that his ass is in the hot seat now.

rows.label: qev055201_MSG0003
rows.name: They have an Orphean expert in Noctilum with them.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055201_MSG0004
rows.name:
This was our first time trying a mission like it,
so we were extra careful in our preparation.
What the hell could have happened?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055201_MSG0005
rows.name:
You're telling me! And I'm left here waiting for a call.
I feel so damn useless.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055201_MSG0006
rows.name:
I guess I got complacent, thinking we'd have that
Orphean fellow to rely on.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055201_MSG0007
rows.name: Maybe they went off the FrontierNav grid.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055201_MSG0008
rows.name:
To make matters worse, this was Anna's first field
mission. ...Er, she's our team rookie.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055201_MSG0009
rows.name:
But the other BLADEs with her are old veterans,
so I'll just have to hold out faith and be patient.
...Bah, forget it! I'm no damn good at being patient![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055201_MSG0010
rows.name: Apologies for the interruption.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055201_MSG0011
rows.name: Are you a friend of Kan'tonam?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055201_MSG0012
rows.name:
Kan'tonam and I split from the same parent body.
In your human terms, he would be my brother.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055201_MSG0013
rows.name:
By my estimation, Kan'tonam and the others were
forced to flee from primordial creaturesâ€”they are
presently in hiding and unable to move.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055201_MSG0014
rows.name:
The Orphe have a special smoke signal for use in such
emergency situations.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055201_MSG0015
rows.name:
The chances that Kan'tonam will use said smoke are
98 percent.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055201_MSG0016
rows.name:
It should then be possible for you to locate him using
that signal.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055201_MSG0017
rows.name:
However, any such rescue operation would require the
added mobility offered by a BLADE escort.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055201_MSG0018
rows.name:
How in the hell do you know... You know what?
Don't matter. I'll do whatever it takes to get 'em back.
Maybe you'd lend a hand, [ST:playername ]?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055201_MSG0019
rows.name: You have my thanks as well.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055201_MSG0020
rows.name:
Still, I'd think a smoke signal like that would have been
spotted already, but I've gotten no reports.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055201_MSG0021
rows.name:
It is a signal intended only for friendly eyes,
invisible to all but the Orphe.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055201_MSG0022
rows.name:
You will require a pair of the goggles we wear.
Please take these.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055201_MSG0023
rows.name:
They should allow you to see the smoke without
problem.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055201_MSG0024
rows.name:
Thanks. This gives us some hope, at least.
Good luck in your search.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055201_MSG0033
rows.name:
The team with Anna and Kan'tonam headed for
Noctilum.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055201_MSG0034
rows.name:
You and that Orphe's smoke signal are our only hope.
Good luck.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055201_MSG0035
rows.name: Kan'tonam's back, and he brought Anna with him![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055201_MSG0036
rows.name:
Though we lost a couple of experienced BLADEs in the
process...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055201_MSG0037
rows.name:
Still, we are very thankful to Kan'tonam for keeping
Anna safe.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055201_MSG0038
rows.name:
And to you for going to help them, of course.
...Oh, and to Yin'tonam for the hint about the smoke.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055201_MSG0039
rows.name: We Orphe act as our Ovah bids us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055201_MSG0040
rows.name:
It is simply a coincidence that our actions also
improved the human's odds for survival.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055201_MSG0041
rows.name: I, uh... I see. You Orphe are certainly a...logical group.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055201_MSG0042
rows.name: Still, it saved Anna's life, and I'm thankful for it.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev055201_MSG0043
rows.name:
I am pleased that everything concluded well.
And I offer you thanks for assisting Kan'tonam.[ST:wait ]
